summary: A test‑focused data layer for Cypress end‑to‑end tests of the Chainlit platform, providing abstracted CRUD operations for entities such as users, UI elements, steps, threads, and feedback, together with utilities for session handling, debug URL generation, and thread history persistence.
business_intent: Enable reliable, maintainable automated UI testing by offering a programmatic interface to set up, query, modify, and clean up Chainlit backend data, reducing dependence on UI interactions and simplifying test orchestration.
